blocks.name: tglowdim1
blocks.content: Lower dimension axiom for one dimension. In dimension at least 1, there are at least two distinct points. The condition "the space is of dimension 1 or more" is written here as ` 2 <_ ( # `` P ) ` to avoid a new definition, but a different convention could be chosen. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Mar-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm tglowdim1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cds, c1))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(citv, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, c0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wceq(c2, cfv(cds, c1)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wceq(c3, cfv(citv, c1)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wi(w0, wcel(c1, cstrkg)))
  sylancr(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wcel(c0, universe), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, c0)))
  fvexi(c0, cbs, c1)
  hashge2el2dif(s0, s1, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tglowdim1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0, s0 ≠ s1)))
  ⊣ c0 =(Base ` c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(dist ` c1)
  ⊣ c3 =(Itv ` c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ TarskiG)
  ⊣ (w0 → 2[≤](# ` c0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0, s0 ≠ s1))), c2 =(dist ` c1))
  a1ii((w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0, s0 ≠ s1))), c3 =(Itv ` c1))
  a1ii((w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0, s0 ≠ s1))), (w0 → c1 ∈ TarskiG))
  sylancr(w0, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0, s0 ≠ s1)), c0 ∈ 𝕌, 2[≤](# ` c0))
  fvexi(c0, cbs, c1)
  hashge2el2dif(s0, s1, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: tglowdim1i
blocks.content: Lower dimension axiom for one dimension. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm tglowdim1i(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wne(c1, cv(s0))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cds, c2))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(citv, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wne(c1, cv(s0)))), wi(w0, wcel(c1, c0)))
  sylibr(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wne(c1, cv(s0))), wrex(s0, c0, wn(wceq(c1, cv(s0)))))
  sylibr(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wn(wceq(c1, cv(s0)))), wn(wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cv(s0)))))
  pm2.65da(w0, wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cv(s0))), wrex(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c0, wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  tglowdim1(hs0, hs1, c0, c2, c3, c4, wa(w0, wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cv(s0)))))
  adantr(w0, wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cv(s0))), wcel(c2, cstrkg))
  adantr(w0, wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cv(s0))), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, c0)))
  nrexdv(hs0, c0, wa(w0, wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cv(s0)))), wrex(hs1, c0, wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  nrexdv(hs1, c0, wa(wa(w0, wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  sylibr(wa(wa(wa(w0, wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wn(wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  eqtr3d(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c1, wa(wa(wa(w0, wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  rspcdva(s0, cv(hs0), c0, wa(wa(wa(w0, wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wceq(c1, cv(hs0)), wceq(c1, cv(s0)))
  eqeq2(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c1)
  simpllr(w0, wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))
  simplr(wa(w0, wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))
  ad4ant24(w0, wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(c1, cv(hs1)))
  rspccva(s0, c0, cv(hs1), wceq(c1, cv(s0)), wceq(c1, cv(hs1)))
  eqeq2(cv(s0), cv(hs1), c1)
  nne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  rexnal(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cv(s0)))
  rexbii(s0, c0, wne(c1, cv(s0)), wn(wceq(c1, cv(s0))))
  df-ne(c1, cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(w0, wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cv(s0)))))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wa(w0, wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c1, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c1, cv(hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tglowdim1i(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ≠ s0))
  ⊣ c0 =(Base ` c2)
  ⊣ c3 =(dist ` c2)
  ⊣ c4 =(Itv ` c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ TarskiG)
  ⊣ (w0 → 2[≤](# ` c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ≠ s0)), (w0 → c1 ∈ c0))
  sylibr(w0, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ≠ s0), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ¬ c1 = s0))
  sylibr(w0, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ¬ c1 = s0), ¬ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 = s0))
  pm2.65da(w0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 = s0), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 ≠ hs1)))
  tglowdim1(hs0, hs1, c0, c2, c3, c4, (w0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 = s0)))
  adantr(w0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 = s0), c2 ∈ TarskiG)
  adantr(w0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 = s0), 2[≤](# ` c0))
  nrexdv(hs0, c0, (w0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 = s0)), ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 ≠ hs1))
  nrexdv(hs1, c0, ((w0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 = s0))∧ hs0 ∈ c0), hs0 ≠ hs1)
  sylibr((((w0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 = s0))∧ hs0 ∈ c0)∧ hs1 ∈ c0), ¬ hs0 ≠ hs1, hs0 = hs1)
  eqtr3d(hs0, hs1, c1, (((w0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 = s0))∧ hs0 ∈ c0)∧ hs1 ∈ c0))
  rspcdva(s0, hs0, c0, (((w0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 = s0))∧ hs0 ∈ c0)∧ hs1 ∈ c0), c1 = hs0, c1 = s0)
  eqeq2(s0, hs0, c1)
  simpllr(w0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 = s0), hs0 ∈ c0, hs1 ∈ c0)
  simplr((w0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 = s0)), hs0 ∈ c0, hs1 ∈ c0)
  ad4ant24(w0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 = s0), hs0 ∈ c0, hs1 ∈ c0, c1 = hs1)
  rspccva(s0, c0, hs1, c1 = s0, c1 = hs1)
  eqeq2(s0, hs1, c1)
  nne(hs0, hs1)
  rexnal(s0, c0, c1 = s0)
  rexbii(s0, c0, c1 ≠ s0, ¬ c1 = s0)
  df-ne(c1, s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 = s0)))
  diff.hs1.w(((w0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 = s0))∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c1, hs1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: tgldimor
blocks.content: Excluded-middle like statement allowing to treat dimension zero as a special case. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Apr-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm tgldimor(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wo(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, c0))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c0))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wo(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, c0))), wo(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wo(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, c0)))))
  mp1i(w0, wo(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wo(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, c0)))), wo(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wo(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1), wbr(nat1, clt, cfv(chash, c0)))))
  mpbi(wo(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wo(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1), wbr(nat1, clt, cfv(chash, c0)))), w3o(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1), wbr(nat1, clt, cfv(chash, c0))))
  ax-mp(w3o(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1), wbr(nat1, clt, cfv(chash, c0))), wcel(c0, universe))
  hashv01gt1(c0, universe)
  3orass(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1), wbr(nat1, clt, cfv(chash, c0)))
  orim2i(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wo(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1), wbr(nat1, clt, cfv(chash, c0))), wo(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, c0))))
  orim2i(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1), wbr(nat1, clt, cfv(chash, c0)), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, c0)))
  mpjaodan(wbr(nat1, clt, cfv(chash, c0)), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, c0)), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cpnf))
  syl5eqbrr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, c0), co(nat1, caddc, nat1), wa(wbr(nat1, clt, cfv(chash, c0)), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0)))
  1p1e2()
  biimpac(wbr(nat1, clt, cfv(chash, c0)), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0), wbr(co(nat1, caddc, nat1), cle, cfv(chash, c0)))
  sylancr(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0), wb(wbr(nat1, clt, cfv(chash, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, caddc, nat1), cle, cfv(chash, c0))), wcel(nat1, cz), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cz))
  1z()
  nn0z(cfv(chash, c0))
  zltp1le(nat1, cfv(chash, c0))
  adantl(wbr(nat1, clt, cfv(chash, c0)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cpnf), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, c0)))
  mpbiri(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cpnf), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, c0)), wbr(nat2, cle, cpnf))
  ax-mp(wbr(nat2, cle, cpnf), wcel(nat2, cxr))
  rexri(nat2)
  2re()
  pnfge(nat2)
  breq2(cfv(chash, c0), cpnf, nat2, cle)
  mp1i(wbr(nat1, clt, cfv(chash, c0)), wo(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cpnf)), wcel(c0, universe))
  hashnn0pnf(c0, universe)
  syl(w0, wb(wo(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, c0))), wo(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wo(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, c0))))), wn(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat0)))
  3syl(w0, wn(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat0)), wcel(c3, c0), wne(c0, emptycls))
  ne0i(c3, c0)
  necon3ai(c0, emptycls, wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat0))
  biimpi(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  ax-mp(wb(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wceq(c0, emptycls)), wcel(c0, universe))
  fvexi(c0, c1, c2)
  hasheq0(c0, universe)
  biorf(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wo(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, c0))))
}

blocks.name: tgldim0eq
blocks.content: In dimension zero, any two points are equal. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Apr-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm tgldim0eq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, c2), nat1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
} = {
  exlimddv(hs0, w0, wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, csn(cv(hs0))))
  sylib(w0, wex(hs0, wceq(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))), wceq(cfv(chash, c2), nat1))
  ax-mp(wb(wceq(cfv(chash, c2), nat1), wex(hs0, wceq(c2, csn(cv(hs0))))), wcel(c2, universe))
  fvexi(c2, c3, c4)
  hash1snb(hs0, c2, universe)
  eqtr4d(c0, c1, cv(hs0), wa(w0, wceq(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))))
  syl(wa(w0, wceq(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))), wceq(c0, cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, csn(cv(hs0))))
  eleqtrd(c0, csn(cv(hs0)), c2, wa(w0, wceq(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, c2))
  elsni(c0, cv(hs0))
  syl(wa(w0, wceq(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))), wceq(c1, cv(hs0)), wcel(c1, csn(cv(hs0))))
  eleqtrd(c1, csn(cv(hs0)), c2, wa(w0, wceq(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpr(w0, wceq(c2, csn(cv(hs0))))
  elsni(c1, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tgldim0eq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 = c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(c3 ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 →(# ` c2)= 1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c2)
} = {
  exlimddv(hs0, w0, c0 = c1, c2 = { hs0 })
  sylib(w0, ∃(hs0, c2 = { hs0 }), (# ` c2)= 1)
  ax-mp(((# ` c2)= 1 ↔ ∃(hs0, c2 = { hs0 })), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvexi(c2, c3, c4)
  hash1snb(hs0, c2, universe)
  eqtr4d(c0, c1, hs0, (w0 ∧ c2 = { hs0 }))
  syl((w0 ∧ c2 = { hs0 }), c0 = hs0, c0 ∈ { hs0 })
  eleqtrd(c0, { hs0 }, c2, (w0 ∧ c2 = { hs0 }))
  adantr(w0, c2 = { hs0 }, c0 ∈ c2)
  elsni(c0, hs0)
  syl((w0 ∧ c2 = { hs0 }), c1 = hs0, c1 ∈ { hs0 })
  eleqtrd(c1, { hs0 }, c2, (w0 ∧ c2 = { hs0 }))
  adantr(w0, c2 = { hs0 }, c1 ∈ c2)
  simpr(w0, c2 = { hs0 })
  elsni(c1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 = c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: tgldim0itv
blocks.content: In dimension zero, any two points are equal. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 12-Apr-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm tgldim0itv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cds, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(citv, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, c4), nat1))
} = {
  eqeltrd(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), c1, w0)
  tgldim0eq(c0, c1, c4, cbs, c5, w0)
  tgbtwntriv1(c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tgldim0itv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈(c1[c2]c3))
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c5)
  ⊣ c6 =(dist ` c5)
  ⊣ c2 =(Itv ` c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ TarskiG)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 →(# ` c4)= 1)
} = {
  eqeltrd(c0, (c1[c2]c3), c1, w0)
  tgldim0eq(c0, c1, c4, cbs, c5, w0)
  tgbtwntriv1(c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
}

blocks.name: tgldim0cgr
blocks.content: In dimension zero, any two pairs of points are congruent. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 12-Apr-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm tgldim0cgr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, c1, c4)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cds, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(citv, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, c5), nat1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
} = {
